verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I want to sing Until I am lost in Your love Until I am found in Your presence Worshiping before Your throne{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Filled with Your spirit Entering in Your realm How precious these moments Lord I want You to know{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Itâ€™s You, You who hath won my heart Taking me into Your arms Comforting me like a friend Your love, surrounding me from the start I never want to be apart from You ever again.{/lang-eng}
